card1.title: About Us
card1.text1:
To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
Creating, learning, and setting goals are the cornerstones of personal and professional growth. Continuous creation can inspire innovation, keep the mind active, and allow people to explore new ideas and express unique perspectives. Learning expands our knowledge and equips us to navigate a rapidly changing world. We are committed to connecting people to grow together, making university life more colorful, filled with warmth and love.

card1.title: Design and Promotion Department
card1.text:
Design: Graphic design (ins post, Manifesto, posters, manuals, brochures, leaflets) (AI, PS, ID)
Media Operations: ins, Xiaohongshu, YouTube,
Video Production: (PR, Jianying, AE, AI video production tools)
Copywriter: Good writing skills, love for writing
Responsible for social media posts at events

card2.title: Technical Department
card2.text:
Website creation and maintenance (GitHub, git, basic website setup) 2-3 people
Front-end design (HTML, CSS)

card3.title: Secretarial Department
card3.text:
Writing work, copywriting, text review, legal background and interest, club document management, human resources management, official club email management
(Microsoft Office, Google Workspace)
2 people

card4.title: Planning Department
card4.text:
Willingness and ideas to participate in event organization, helping with event organization, and people with relevant experience
(Project management software such as Notion, ClickUp, Asana, project management experience)

card5.title: Business Department
card5.text: Event sponsorship and external liaison work, coordinating sponsor requirements and club resources (sponsorship resource development, business, and pragmatism)

card6.title: Finance Department
card6.text: Basic knowledge of economics and related knowledge (balance sheet) 1-2 people, financial statements, event financial flow management

card7.title: Club Management Department
card7.text: Interest club management (including standardized processes for establishing new interest clubs, group management, internal activities of interest clubs)
